name: Kill Wolf Protect Life
description:
Kill Wolf Protect Life is a real test of your sniper shooting skills. You have to be very precise. Make yourself stable as sudden appearance of the wolf may cause wave of fear. Aim at the running wolf, kill them all as you have very short time. Will improve your aiming and shooting skills as shooting a running wolf is more difficult.
Features:
- Become the strongest wolf
- Fast and action packed gameplay
- Beautiful dynamic runtime world
- Realistic wilderness
- Amazing 3D graphics.
